teamMembers.name: Rowland Simiyu
teamMembers.biography: Rowland, founder of SeasPark Consultancy, leverages several years of experience as a SAP Consultant across diverse industries. He is responsible for steering SeasPark’s overall vision, mission, and business strategy. His focus is driving the company's growth and maintaining a competitive position in the market. He is a people-oriented leader and has a deep understanding of business processes and operations
teamMembers.personalBiography: A graduate of University of Nairobi, Rowland has cultivated working relationships with colleges and businesses across the nation in development of innovative workforce solutions.

teamMembers.name: Timothy Mbogo
teamMembers.biography: Timothy is a professional software developer with over 10 years of experience in designing and implementing complex business systems. He is a Certified SAP Developer whose focus is on development and intergration of SAP Solution

teamMembers.name: Anne Nderi
teamMembers.biography: Anne is an experienced ERP consultant specializing in tailored ERP solutions, optimizing operations, and increasing efficiency for businesses. Her focus is on resolving business challenges, leading system integrations, providing user training, and delivering ongoing support for sustained success. Expertise results in streamlined processes and improved decision-making capabilities for businesses.

teamMembers.name: Dennis Kibunja
teamMembers.biography: Dennis is an experienced and Certified SAP Consultant with many years of implementing and supporting SAP Solutions such as SAP Business One, SAP SD, SAP HANA & S/4HANA solutions. He is also a Certified Information Systems Auditor® (CISA).

teamMembers.name: Richard O. Omboga
teamMembers.biography: Richard is an experienced software Engineer who is proficient in Java, C#, Kotlin, PHP, and JavaScript. He is also skilled in modern methodologies, cloud tech, and DevOps. A strong leader, mentor, and problem-solver with a passion for emerging technologies

teamMembers.name: Duncan Kwatemba
teamMembers.biography: IT professional with 5 years' experience in IT support and data analysis. Proficient in Power BI, Tableau, and SAP predictive analytics. Team-oriented with a focus on meeting deadlines and delivering top-notch IT services.

teamMembers.name: Charity Thomas
teamMembers.biography: Experienced professional in sales automation and Fleet Management System (FMS) implementations. Skilled in data analysis, KPI extraction, agreement drafting, issue resolution, process documentation, and reporting tool development. Strong communicator, adept at translating data for management and supporting training initiatives.

teamMembers.name: Vanice Olal
teamMembers.biography: Experienced HR Generalist skilled in HR policies, payroll, and employment law. Focuses on fostering supportive environments, ensuring compliance, and resolving HR issues. Proficient in building relationships and driving employee development. Strategically aligns HR practices with business objectives for sustained success.
